summary: Team confirmed everyone is ready. PM will prioritize and assign work; Architect (Mike) can review architecture/design backlog or items needing sign-off; QA (Jordan) will run tests for items marked "Ready for testing" with expected output; Developer is ready to begin development when assigned.

actions.task: Prioritize today's work and assign development and testing tasks to the team
Review architecture/design backlog and any items needing sign-off
Run tests for items marked "Ready for testing" using the provided expected output
Begin development tasks once assignments are provided by PM
